level.heading: Sale of broad head, bladed or hunting arrows.
level.text: ยง 10-132 Sale of broad head, bladed or hunting arrows. a. It shall be unlawful for any person to sell or dispose of to a person under sixteen a broad head, bladed or hunting arrow or arrowhead. b. Any person who shall violate this section shall, upon conviction, be punished by a fine of not more than fifty dollars, or by imprisonment not exceeding thirty days, or by both such fine and imprisonment.
